subject: Football (College)
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: When the No. 15 Sun Devils host U.C.L.A., one of the last things Foster will see before running on the field is a picture of his sister, Jennifer, who died of a drug overdose five years ago.
snippet: When the No. 15 Sun Devils host U.C.L.A., one of the last things Foster will see before running on the field is a picture of his sister, Jennifer, who died of a drug overdose five years ago.
